channel.title: Mezzyscape help
channel.description:
Need help fixing specs in mezzyscape.
Karosi sword has NO Spec. All godsword specs are fail. d claws hits like 8k staff of light spec doesn't work
And also i cant pickup loot. Any help would be appreciated.

item.title: Mezzyscape help
item.dc:creator: @Honnee18 Honnee18
item.description:
@Honnee18 wrote:

thank’s for ur reply. The godswords actually dont even do anything. The special bar is there. It uses 25% energy and spins arm in the air then hits. pretty slow.

you know about the looting?

Read full topic

item.title: Mezzyscape help
item.dc:creator: @Get_Blitz Get Blitz
item.description:
@Get_Blitz wrote:

I am not sure about 525+ but look for the method that adds spec to the godwars and add korsai ITEMID. The godswords you probably mean the gfx and anim. like i said not famaler with 525+ just search for the godsword id and try getting the right gfx and anim. Hope i helped

Read full topic
